comment.author: 36899742@N00
comment._content: The team was variously known as the Highlanders (because they played in Hilltop Park), the Yankees, and the New York Americans. The Highlanders name was dropped when they left Hilltop Park. wikipedia entries: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_Yankees en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hilltop_Park
